Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class BlackjackClient extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • client
          java.net.Socket client
          this clients socket
        • disconnect
          javax.swing.JButton disconnect
          disconnect button to be pressed to disconnect from the server
        • displayArea
          javax.swing.JTextArea displayArea
          the display area to display information about the game
        • hitButton
          javax.swing.JButton hitButton
          hit button to be pressed when the user wants a new card
        • input
          java.io.ObjectInputStream input
          the input stream from the server
        • message
          java.lang.String message
          the message sent from the server
        • output
          java.io.ObjectOutputStream output
          the output stream to the server
        • restartButton
          javax.swing.JButton restartButton
          restart button to be pressed when the user wants to start a new hand
        • server
          java.lang.String server
          the ip address of the server
        • stayButton
          javax.swing.JButton stayButton
          stay button to be pressed when user wants to keep their current hand

    • Class BlackjackServer extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • connection
          java.net.Socket connection
          the connected client
        • count
          int count
          keeps track of what number of clients have connected so far
        • dealerHand
          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> dealerHand
          an array list storing all of the cards in the dealers hand, index 0 represents the card the player can see
        • dealerScore
          int dealerScore
          keeps the dealers score as to not have to restore every time
        • deck
          Deck deck
          the deck used to preform the blackjack options
        • displayArea
          javax.swing.JTextArea displayArea
          the server side text display box
        • gameStarted
          boolean gameStarted
          stores weather a blackjack game has been started the hit and stay button will do nothing when this is false
        • input
          java.io.ObjectInputStream input
          the input from the client
        • output
          java.io.ObjectOutputStream output
          the output to be sent to each of the clients
        • playerHand
          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> playerHand
          an array list storing all of the cards in the players hand
        • playerScore
          int playerScore
          keeps the players score as to not have to restore every time
        • server
          java.net.ServerSocket server
          keeps the correct port and other server information
